channel.title: Shop help
channel.description: Ok so i have a little problem with my shops. you can buy a full inv of something but you right click the item and hit sell 100 and it sells only one and it gives them the money that they sold 100. any1 know how to fix this?

item.description:
@drew56133 wrote:

Ok so i have a little problem with my shops. you can buy a full inv of something but you right click the item and hit sell 100 and it sells only one and it gives them the money that they sold 100. any1 know how to fix this?
